amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce by $113 million the appropriation for HUD management and administrative expenses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 26, as amendment No. 44, to reduce by $113 million the appropriation for HUD management and administrative expenses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 184 - 239 (Roll no. 592).
